# Heal Animal Companion (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Healing Spells|healing]])

**Level:** [[5th Level Druid Spells|Druid 5]], [[3rd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Your animal companion touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 110

*You lay your hand on your animal companion, and as you do, its eyes become clear and focused, and it breathes easier.*

This spell functions like *[[Heal (Skill)|heal]]*, except that it affects only your animal companion.
